Main_media.caption: Timelapse movie of a hiPSC colony expressing paxillin-EGFP. Images are a single slice near the bottom of the cell taken every 5 minutes for 400 minutes on a spinning-disk confocal microscope. Movie sped up 3000x over real time.

Timelapse movie of a hiPSC colony expressing paxillin-EGFP. Images taken as a partial z-stack near the bottom of the cell every 5 minutes for 160 minutes on a spinning-disk confocal microscope. Image is a maximum intensity projection. Movie sped up 1500x over real time.

Single image of a live hiPSC colony expressing paxillin-EGFP imaged on a spinning-disk confocal microscope. Left panel is a single slice of the z-tack near the bottom of the cell; right pnael is this same projection overlaid onto one slice of the same z-stack in the transmitted light channel.
Viability and colony formation photographed 3 days post-thaw at 4X magnification. Cells were treated with ROCK inhibitor for 24 hrs post-thaw.

EditingDesign_gene_figure_caption: Top: PXN locus showing 4 PXN isoforms; Bottom: Zoom in on EGFP insertion site at PXN C-terminal exon
GenomicCharacterization_tagged_allele_ge: PCR primers were designed to amplify the full length insertion. Gel shows untagged allele (smaller band) and tagged allele (larger band) from single PCR reaction. (1% Agarose gel with Thermo Fisher 1kb plus ladder)
GenomicCharacterization_junction_table_c: PCR amplified and Sanger sequenced 5’, 3’, WT, and full allele junctions to check for precise EGFP insertion. Primers were designed to exclude amplification from the donor plasmid.
GenomicCharacterization_ddpcr_caption: EGFP: EGFP/RPP30 ratio from ddPCR assay; values = 0.5 +/- 0.05 indicate heterozygous clone, values = 1 +/- 0.05 indicate homozygous clone. Plasmid: AmpR/RPP30 ratio from ddPCR assay; values <0.1 indicate clone with no detectable plasmid integration. RPP30 is known 2n reference gene.
GenomicCharacterization_offtargets_capti: Potential off-targets were identified using CasOFFinder; ~4 off-targets in exons and ~ 4 most likely to cut off-targets (having fewest # of flaws relative to on-target) were sanger sequenced to confirm no off-target editing.
StemCellCharacterization_pluripotency_an: iPSCs were stained with directly conjugated antibodies from BD Bioscience, acquired using a FACSAria Fusion (BD Bioscience), and analyzed using FlowJo software (Treestar, Inc.). Doublets were excluded, then marker-specific gates were set according to corresponding fluorescence-minus-one (FMO) controls.
StemCellCharacterization_karyotype_capti: After cells banks were created, one vial was thawed and 30 G-banded metaphase cells were karyotyped.
StemCellCharacterization_trilineage_capt: iPSCs were subjected to a 5-7 day, non-terminal, directed differentiation using the STEMdiff™ Trilineage Differentiation Kit (STEMCELL Technologies, Inc.). Cells were stained for markers of Ectoderm, Endoderm, and Mesoderm lineages using directly conjugated antibodies from BD Bioscience. Gating was based on isotype controls.
StemCellCharacterization_differentiation: iPSCs were differentiated to cardiomyocytes and observed for initiation of beating starting at day 6. At ~day 20, cells were fixed and stained with anti-Troponin T (BD Bioscience) and gating was based on an isotype control.
StemCellCharacterization_rnaseq_fig_capt: Transcript levels of stem cell markers and edited locus. Heat maps are based on log2 normalized read counts. Cardiomyocyte samples at Day 5 and Day 20 are shown for comparison. Unedited Stem Cell samples are from passage 14 and passage 8. PXN-EGFP samples are from two independent clones.
Protocols_imaging: /data/pdfs/AICS_SOP_WTC cell plating on glass for imaging.pdf

GenomicCharacterization_junction_schemat: PCR amplified and Sanger sequenced 5’, 3’, WT, and full allele junctions to check for precise mEGFP insertion. Primers were designed to exclude amplification from the donor plasmid.
GenomicCharacterization_tagged_allele_ge: PCR primers were designed to amplify the full length insertion. Gel shows untagged allele (smaller band) and tagged allele (larger band) from single PCR reaction. (1% Agarose gel with Thermo Fisher 1kb plus ladder)
GenomicCharacterization_ddpcr_caption: EGFP: EGFP/RPP30 ratio from ddPCR assay; values = 0.5 +/- 0.05 indicate heterozygous clone, values = 1 +/- 0.05 indicate homozygous clone. Plasmid: AmpR/RPP30 ratio from ddPCR assay; values <0.1 indicate clone with no detectable plasmid integration. RPP30 is known 2n reference gene.
GenomicCharacterization_offtargets_capti: Potential off-targets were identified using CasOFFinder; ~4 off-targets in exons and ~4 most likely to cut off-targets (having fewest # of flaws relative to on-target) were sanger sequenced to confirm no off-target editing
GenomicCharacterization_junction_table_c: PCR amplified and Sanger sequenced 5’, 3’, WT, and full allele junctions to check for precise EGFP insertion. Primers were designed to exclude amplification from the donor plasmid.
Validation_WesternBlot: /images/AICS-0023/Western blot documentation TJP1 final clone only_final.jpg
StemCellCharacterization_karyotype_capti: After cells banks were created, one vial was thawed and 30 G-banded metaphase cells were karyotyped.
Protocols_imaging: /data/pdfs/AICS_SOP_WTC cell plating on glass for imaging.pdf

Main_gene_name: Microtubule associated protein 1 light chain 3 beta
